pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: vila; rumah liburan; pondok musim panas
bagian dari kata yang ditulis dalam kana

lessons.japanese: スミスさんのために送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: A farewell party was held in honor of Mr Smith.

lessons.japanese: ジョーンズ氏のために送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: A farewell meeting was held in honor of Mr Jones.

lessons.japanese: 退職する重役に敬意を表して送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: A farewell party was held in honor of the retiring executive.

lessons.japanese: 退職する重役に敬意を表して送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: A farewell party was held for the executive who was retiring.

lessons.japanese: 送別会は来週行われるでしょう。
lessons.indonesian: The farewell party will take place next week.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは川村博士を祝して送別会を開いた。
lessons.indonesian: We held a farewell party in honor of Dr. Kawamura.

lessons.japanese: 昨日ジョーンズ氏のために送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: A farewell party was held in honor of Mr Jones yesterday.

lessons.japanese: 昨日ジョーンズ氏のために送別会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: Yesterday, a farewell party was held for Mr. Jones.
